#summary Details on authenticateUser() API function
#sidebar ApiFunctions

Call this function to authenticate yourself and get a personal token. You'll have to pass this token as parameter to call API functions.


=== Call ===

 * syntax : authenticateUser(string !ApiKey)

 * parameter : _string_ : your personal API key received from Delcampe

=== Response ===

 * response : _array_ : the response is always an array of 2 elements
  * element 1 : _boolean_ : true (if call ok) or false (if call not ok)
  * element 2 : 
   * if call ok : _string_ : your personal token
   * if call not ok : _string_ : error message

 * notification : none

=== Code example (PHP) ===
{{{
//FUNCTION CALL
$objSoapClient = new SoapClient('http://api.delcampe.net/soap.php?wsdl');
list($success, $token) = $objSoapClient->authenticateUser('MyPersonalApiKey');
}}}
